post.body: LOL sure thing, but you'd have to take care of my airfare :)
Well I'm definitely getting my secret kitten from a pound, I'm gonna 'shop around'. I'm thinking an all black kitten :)
Dom Ive gotten that once before! I'm actually Caucasian, Turkish & Egyptian
I can't believe you ate a 1k+ cal lunch! I felt guilty for eating 1300 yesterday :-/ ..but I'm also not made of muscle like u!
if my apartment was following me on twitter then she'd have a hell of a lot more to worry about than secret kittens :D
Good morning baby! How are you?
he's 25, which I know is still young, but he's one of those ppl that started partying super early & hard so they burn out sooner
but we had both wanted to break up for weeks before it finally happened. He did it through an EMAIL & VOICEMAIL!!! What a pussy!!
we broke up because I hung up on him & because I'm "immature" & like to party too much...... ummm hello I'm twenty-fucking-one!!!!
it's the same ex! My other exes are in Charlotte, Wilmington or San Francisco :)
we always end up fooling around haha. I already sent his ass home,no worries & no regrets! Just some sore nipp-err nevermind ;)
well we've only known each other like 5 months, but we dated for two months & broke up October 24th.. 3 days before my bday :-/
no, I'm gonna get my kitten after Christmas. I'm so excited!!
I have a whole shoebox full! I'm obsessed with always having perfectly painted nails & toenails
I would except that it's been raining constantly..for the past TWO days! And I have a final tomorrow, no fun until it's done
ehh it makes my house so muggy! I'm sitting here in a tshirt & shorts & I'm effing hot & my hair is not liking the humidity
thank you :) now can I get a Tiffany's ring? Size 7! Kthanxbye
Have you ever had a veggie burger from BK before? Are they good?
my friend has all the seasons on his computer. I'm watching it on his flatscreen tv :)
k good. Have a safe flight & post lots of pictures on twinkle!
dude say something!! You're going to have to sit next to them for 8 hours, so ask a flight attndt if you can switch seats
At least now you have a justified shopping spree?
your story was the perfect thing to read before falling asleep on Xmas Eve! And by story I mean historically accurate account ;)
it could've said 'meat' on purpose though! Because they're like pieces of meat? Because they're strippers?Uhhn right..??
I just spent the last 4 hours making flashcards for my Islamic Art class! If I don't get an A on my final on Friday Imma kill someboby!!
When I come back from Xmas break I'm getting a kitten!! It will be a secret kitten since my apartment doesn't allow animals. I'm EXCITED!!!
I just woke up & jesus I look rough haha http://snipurl.com/7qq0j
Confession time.... and dear god, twinklers please don't judge me....... here goes: *deep breath* I want to be a hipster......
I hate it when I wake up to get a glass of water then can't get back to sleep. Now I'm hydrated but very annoyed!
Good night everyone!!
Good night everyone! I feel bad, ate half a (mini) bag of Doritos :-/ oh well, making out burns calories, right?? Byeeeee kids :D
So even though I HATE my ex.... he is an AMAZING kisser and, for the most part, very sexually attentive! Also.. I'm drunk. Whatever!
AMAZING, I <3 my mom http://snipurl.com/7waef
This food was amazing!! Moroccon chicken over Basmati rice with Greek salad http://snipurl.com/7vc44
My friend is getting his nape pierced today!!!! I'm more nervous than he is!
Done with fall semester!!! I feel pretty solid about the exam. WHOOOOOO!!!!! Now...... to drink!
I look adorable today! http://snipurl.com/7twxy
Scrambled eggs with salsa & a toasted English muffin with grape jelly. Big breakfast for a big day! http://snipurl.com/7tpv0
Islamic Art final in 3 hours!!!!! Ahhhh it's 30% of our course grade!! 30%!!!!!!
RIP Bettie Page :(
I deserve chocolate milk after all this studying bullshit! So, chocolate milk and then sleep. Night everyone!
Islamic Art flashcards are everywhere!! Ahhhh!!! http://snipurl.com/7t2kr
Ugh my brain hurts, time to take a break
"Pat on the Black" is a very sexy color :) http://snipurl.com/7skxf
This weather is ridiculous! It's mid December and like 65 degrees outside!! WTF?!?!
I'm a hungry hungry hippo! I want a donut with a hot black coffee. Or some pie with black coffee....... some sort of dessert with coffee!
My friend is making venison tacos!! Fucking YUMMMMMM!!!
Just took a 3 hour nap! Hahahaha
How can I make it look cooler?? http://snipurl.com/8h3ff
My friend's piercing he got on Friday.. and yes, it really is like 3 inches long!! http://snipurl.com/8cz0z
Stoned :)
Watching Major Payne for the first time http://snipurl.com/8c0so
I just saved a spider :) http://snipurl.com/8bdzk
Watching Weeds for the first time, it's AMAZING!!
I got the pineapple rice :) been hanging out with my friend Tim all weekend & having a blast!
Should I get #35 or #39??? I know for a fact both are insanely delicious! http://snipurl.com/813zo
Laying in bed with the lava lamp on & listening to STS9. I feel like crap :( http://snipurl.com/810n9
Ugh my tummy hurts, I'm nauseous & feel bloated from all the beer I drank last night. Woe is me! Additionally, my shins are so damn itchy!
Why won't twinkle let me block people?!?! I can block them for a second then they come unblocked again :(
What does the # in tweets mean??
Think I might go to Michaels & buy paint stuff... I'm super bored & want to be artistic!
Yes, that is a giant uncooked mushroom with ranch and mustard. And yes I realize I'm not normal! http://snipurl.com/808bz
Nothing like drinking Jewish beer on a Christian (ehh but technically originally pagan) holiday! http://snipurl.com/945xd
Merry Christmas bitchez! Hope all you ho-ho-hobags have a great day with family & friends!
Good night all! Wish I was a little kid again, I used to get soooo excited on Christmas Eve. Now it's just another night in the year :-/
Merry Christmas you ho-ho-hobags!!!!! From a Muslim (me) to all of you! (Yes, I really am Muslim!)
2/2 ..like you, maybe I just think I do because we have awesome sex' & he was like 'no, it's more than that.. blah blah.. I like you too'!
(1 of 2)So the guy called me, we skirted around the topic then he finally asked me why I liked him, I told him.. but I said 'maybe I don't..
Ugh this sucks, I'm so stupid with my big mouth! Hope I didn't scare him away, the sex is way too insane for us to stop now! Boys=headaches!
Texted my "friends with benefits" guy 'I know this is just a hook up, but ...I like you..' and got no reply. Should I text him 'nevermind'??
Texted my "friends with benefits" guy 'I know this is just a hook up, but ...I like you..' and got no reply. Stress. *sigh* and now I wait..
Boys are stupid, stupid, stupid! But damn, I hafta admit, I'm one hell of a fool myself! Amen, hallelujah and preach it! Mmmmm huhhh *snap!*
Laying on my bed with my eyes shut for a minute... I almost fell asleep, I'm so very tired! But I'm going shopping with my mom, holla! :)
I'm starting to have feelings for my 'friends with benefits' guy. I don't know if it's cause he's soo hot or because the sex is insane..
Stoned :) hollaaaaaa!
I've been left alone with an Xbox full of Aqua Teen Hunger Force!!! HELL YES!!!
In a pimp house that my friends house-sitting for, eating dank food, drinking rum. Awesome night is about to take place!!
I want chicken wings!!!! Mmmmmmmmmmmmmm with bleu cheese, yum yum yum!!!
Not having sex today, we both need to heal, especially after last night's unexpected marathon! So sore, so many bruises.. but I want more!!!
Ugh I feel so nauseous :( for lunch I'm having either some amazing meatloaf with mashed potatoes or some bombass chicken wings! HMMMMMM...
